basic.description: This is a course on judicial, or court-ordered remedies.  The focus of the course will be on particular problems in the law of damages, both at law and in equity (including equitable compensation).  We will also discuss specific performance, injunctive relief and Anton Piller orders.  (Jointly with LAW-314.) Three term hours, Fall. M. Pratt.
basic.subject: LAW
basic.title: Remedies
